doc.field: Marilyn Symmes collection of art exhibition ephemera
Marilyn Symmes collection of art exhibition ephemera

Includes material from artists, among others, Jennifer Bartlett, David Bates, Romare Bearden, E.J. Bellocq, Huma Bhabha, Dara Birnbaum, Christian Boltanski, Marcel Broodthaers, Jude Broughan, Glenn Brown, and Richmond Burton. Also includes a catalogue of the eight silkscreened images by John Baldessari of his series, Madame Cezanne's Hairdos presented at Gemini G.E.L. in 2016. Also includes a brochure from The Museum of Contemporary Art San Diego on John Baldessari and The Print Retrospective from the Collections of Jordan D. Schnitzer and his Family Foundation. Includes a pamphlet advertising The Gehenna Press' book, "Grotesques"with etchings and writings by Baskin. Includes an announcement of a Mary Bauermeister exhibition, "live in peace or leave the galaxy", complete with a balloon to bring to the gallery for inflation. Includes a catalogue from Weil Gallery, Watson Fine Arts, Wheaton College of Allison Bianco Atlantic Time. Also includes a National Gallery of Art brochure on a 2011-2012 exhibition of works by Mel Bochner. Includes a MOMA brochure on a 1995 exhibition of The Prints of Louise Bourgeois. Includes an announcement of a 2017 exhibition of works by Katherine Bradford with an excerpt from an article about the artist by Chris Martin. Also includes a brochure from the Highpoint Center for Printmaking on an exhibition of New Prints by Julie Buffalohead with her biography.
Marilyn Symmes collection of art exhibition ephemera
Series I. Single Artist Exhibitions >> B (Set 2) (2 folders)
